de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.testacr
Class Runner

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.testacr.Runner
Direct Known Subclasses:
BARTRunner, JavaRapRunner, LingpipeRunner
public abstract class Runner
extends java.lang.Object

Blueprint for classes which run an acr system.

If you want to add your own acr system, you have to implement this interface.

Constructor Summary
Runner()
          Default constructor without any parameters.
 
Method Summary
abstract  java.util.List<Entity> getCoreferents()
          Get the actual results from the system as CoreferencePairs.
abstract  void init(MMAXParser mmax)
          Init the acr system on the specified MMAXParser file.
abstract  void run()
          Run the acr system for the specified MMAX-Parser and process the extracted Coreferences to transform them to CoreferencePairs which are used by our system.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Runner

public Runner()
Default constructor without any parameters. Used to initialize the system itself.

Method Detail

init

public abstract void init(MMAXParser mmax)
Init the acr system on the specified MMAXParser file. This method could be used to check for special annotation levels in the MMAX file. If you don't need it, just store the fileName for the run-method.

Parameters:
mmax - The input file for the system.

run

public abstract void run()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Run the acr system for the specified MMAX-Parser and process the extracted Coreferences to transform them to CoreferencePairs which are used by our system.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If anything goes wrong during the process, the runner should throw an Exception.

getCoreferents

public abstract java.util.List<Entity> getCoreferents()
Get the actual results from the system as CoreferencePairs.

Returns:
List of CoreferencePairs.
